Texts.Chs: 把^orange;观察器^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Watcher^reset; to the ^green;purple-armored scientist^reset; at the top floor of the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 尝试在你的^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;制作一个^orange;观察器^reset;，并把它带给我。
Texts.Eng: Powered stations are a ^orange;huge productivity booster^white;. With a ^orange;Watcher^reset; they are even more versatile! Try crafting a ^orange;watcher^reset; in your ^green;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me.

Texts.Chs: 观察器对于设备来说是非常重要的。它们会让^green;20格^reset;范围内的设备在你远离后还能持续工作。如果你离开了该星球，那么^orange;所有的观察器将会关闭^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Watchers are special. They will keep powered devices within their range ^gray;(20 blocks)^reset; running while you are away, planetside. Leaving a planet will ^orange;reset all of your watchers^reset;. ^red;Don't overuse them!^reset; Your SAIL can only track so many before it slows down.
